fields.summary: esi-install-image fails when clcadmin system credential is used

status.description: This issue has not yet been validated, and is not currently being investigated.
status.name: Unconfirmed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Cannot reliably install the service image using 'esi-install-image' during faststart installation.  The OSG is up and functional according to my assessment when this happens but it gets a failure from Mule and "Image.component"


{code:java}
Wed Jul 27 06:34:28 2016  WARN [org.jboss.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:EphemeralConfiguration:arn:euca:bootstrap:::com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequests/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#217] The pipeline contains no upstream handlers; discarding: [id: 0x0933df18] OPEN
Wed Jul 27 06:34:36 2016  WARN [org.jboss.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline:Compute.03] The pipeline contains no upstream handlers; discarding: [id: 0xc46f7f63] OPEN
Wed Jul 27 06:34:37 2016 ERROR [org.mule.exception.DefaultMessagingExceptionStrategy:Compute.03]
********************************************************************************
Message               : Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{Image.component}. Message payload is of type: RegisterImageType
Code                  : MULE_ERROR--2
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Exception stack is:
1. Manifest is not accessible (com.eucalyptus.compute.ClientComputeException)
  com.eucalyptus.images.ImageManifests:473 (null)
2. Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{Image.component}. Message payload is of type: RegisterImageType (org.mule.component.ComponentException)
  org.mule.component.DefaultComponentLifecycleAdapter:348 (http://www.mulesoft.org/docs/site/current3/apidocs/org/mule/component/ComponentException.html)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

        at com.eucalyptus.images.ImageManifests.lookup(ImageManifests.java:473)
        at com.eucalyptus.images.ImageManager.register(ImageManager.java:173)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
    + 3 more (set debug level logging or '-Dmule.verbose.exceptions=true' for everything)
********************************************************************************

********************************************************************************

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    + 3 more (set debug level logging or '-Dmule.verbose.exceptions=true' for everything)
********************************************************************************

Wed Jul 27 06:34:38 2016  WARN [org.jboss.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:EphemeralConfiguration:arn:euca:bootstrap:::com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequests/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#220] The pipeline contains no upstream handlers; discarding: [id: 0xec61e99e] OPEN
Wed Jul 27 06:34:38 2016  WARN [org.jboss.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:EphemeralConfiguration:arn:euca:bootstrap:::com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequests/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#220] The pipeline contains no upstream handlers; discarding: [id: 0xec61e99e] CLOSED

{code}

From the faststart log we see this from the configure.rb recipe: 


{code:java}

Found tarball /usr/share/eucalyptus/service-images/eucalyptus-service-image-2.48.tar.xz

[2016-07-27T06:36:14-07:00] INFO: ruby_block[Install Service Image] called
[2016-07-27T06:36:14-07:00] INFO: Processing execute[create_imaging_worker] action run (eucalyptus::configure line 355)
[2016-07-27T06:36:14-07:00] INFO: Processing execute[Guard resource] action run (dynamically defined)
[2016-07-27T06:36:15-07:00] INFO: execute[Guard resource] ran successfully

================================================================================

Expected process to exit with [0], but received '1'

STDOUT: You need to set 'services.imaging.worker.image' before enabling service

The status of the cloud is:


{code:java}
[root@a-38 ~]# euserv-describe-services

fields.summary: ClientComputeException: Manifest is not accessible during install image (in faststart)

comments.body: This error occurs if the owner (account number) in the manifest does not match that of the identity registering the image.
We cannot use clcadmin-assume-system-credentials for the install service image operation.  The recommended solution is to create admin creds and use those for this purpose.
